title: Dekisokonai no Monogatari
sinopse:
Juju doesn’t remember anything – not even his name (it was the writing on his coffin) – and yes, he’s already dead. But he’s been revived and introduced to Liila – a girl with prehensile hair and his right hand has been replaced, so there must be an adventure ahead!

(Source: NatsuYume ver. 1)
